content: [TextBlock(text="[2025 | Age 22] Back in NYC, the city feels different now. Every corner seems to have a new tech twist. Just saw a street performer using a blockchain-based digital hat for tips. You drop your digital identity in, and if you like the show, a secure transaction happens. Makes me think about the old $XVI days - when a hat was just a hat, and tips were in cash. Life's gotten so digital, even my nostalgic moments feel like they're from a bygone era. But hey, at least my wearable health monitor tells me my heart rate's still normal when I'm reminiscing. #NYC #TechTales #Nostalgia", type='text')]
